name: 足払い
caption: This is riskier than you or your opponent will think it is.
notes: Horizontal Activation Range: 400

name: 2K
caption: The queen of 2Ks

name: ダスト
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on ground hit: 16F
Floating crumple on ground hit: Total 28F (airborne hitstun 1-11F, standing hitstun 12-18F, can block 19-28F)
R.I.S.C. Loss in [ ] refers to when 5D is not the initial hit of a combo.
Wall Damage in ( ) refers to if opponent is touching the wall.
Has no additional Combo Decay on initial hit, unlike other overheads (usually adding +5 on initial hit for 10 total).
Telegraphing orange glow appears on frame 4, and reaches full brightness on frame 5.

name: 5K
caption: The Swiss Army Knife of kicks

name: 溜めダスト
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on raw hit: 45F
Properties for opponent on block follow Level 4 rules.
R.I.S.C. Loss in [ ] refers to when 5[D] is not the initial hit of a combo.
Wall Damage in ( ) refers to if opponent is touching the wall.
Wall Damage when hit raw is increased to 700 (900).
Applies 5 less Combo Decay on initial hit, for 0 Combo Decay if the first hit of a combo.
Telegraphing orange glow appears on frame 4, and reaches full brightness on frame 5.

name: 6HS
caption: Get used to cancelling off this hitNightmarish for Goldlewis in particular

name: 6P
caption: Smile through the pain
notes: If the first hit of a combo, applies an additional +20 Combo Decay.

name: 近S
notes: Input Proximity Range: 270

name: jD
caption: Ever wondered how cancelling a projectile would work?
notes:
Clash Level: 1
Clash Hits: 1

name: jS
caption: Heads up, safe jump

name: ワイルドアサルト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
caption: Instant servant pressure, for a price.
notes:
Guard crush duration: 35F
Adds additional momentum on cancels except Backdash and Backward Jump.
Staggers on grounded hit. Listed on-hit value is for gold (fast) recovery.
Total stagger duration: 34F (1-26F hitstun, 27-34F can block only)
Hitstun duration is increased by 4F for red (normal) recovery, and 8F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (30F and 34F respectively)
Total duration is increased by 5F for red (normal) recovery, and 10F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (39F and 44F respectively)

input: 溜めワイルドアサルト(236[D])
name: 溜めワイルドアサルト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
caption: Instant servant pressure, for a price.
notes:
Guard crush duration: 39F
Adds additional momentum on cancels except Backdash and Backward Jump.

name: 投げ
notes:
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15

name: 空投げ
notes:
Air Throws have both normal recovery (which recovers CH) and special recovery frames upon landing (not CH). It is technically possible to recover mid-air from a whiffed Air Throw, but it usually doesn't happen unless done from very high in the air.
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
On-Hit value is for attacker's IAD height, except for Potemkin and Nagoriyuki, who have their instant Air Throw height instead.
Frame advantage decreases as height increases (+42 to +56).
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15

name: カウントダウン
caption: You've probably forgotten she had this move
notes:
Guard Crush duration: 29F
Detonation timer starts on frame 4 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled.
New servants summoned during a countdown will not be affected by the countdown, and can even be issued their own countdown.
If a servant is held when the countdown hits zero, Jack-O' immediately exits her Held Servant stance.
Defend Command cannot deflect Jack-O's own Countdown explosion.
When the explosion begins, the servants are immediately removed and cannot be interrupted. They have no collision, are fully invulnerable, and do not count as an active servant for Jack-O's Servant Gauge recharge.
When used, Servant Gauge will be regained for 1 frame before pausing it.
The countdown is paused during either player's Overdrives, until the user has fully recovered.&lt
sup&gt
&lt
i&gt
Potential bug&lt
/i&gt
&lt
/sup&gt

If the explosion hits Jack-O' ''before'' hitting the opponent, no negative R.I.S.C. scaling will affect the damage, even mid-combo (see more: [[GGST/Jack-O/Strategy#Unscaled_Countdown|Unscaled Countdown]]).&lt
sup&gt
&lt
i&gt
Potential bug&lt
/i&gt
&lt
/sup&gt

name: 攻撃指示
caption: Slash! This is the entire reason you want servants.
notes:
Servant starts attacking on frame 4 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled.
If only a held servant is active, pauses Servant Gauge for only 0.5 seconds.
When used, Servant Gauge will be regained for 1 frame before pausing it.

name: 回収
caption: Ironically, best used without servants.
notes:
Servant starts recalling on frame 4 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled.
Will interrupt servants during Countdown unless already detonating.
Does not pause Servant Gauge recharge like other commands.
Jack-O' has improved Servant Gauge recharge when no servants are active, making Recover Servant functionally cheaper.
Despite improved recharge, the Servant Gauge cost is ''still'' more than the amount that can be restored from a servant that has been launched  (5 seconds total)
Due to the loss of Command Servant Gauge lowering the gauge limit, the Summon Servant Gauge restored will usually be lower than the potential amount.

name: 防御指示
caption: Shield! Cover yourself in neutral.
notes:
Shield activates on frame 4 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled.
Projectiles (including &lt
span style=&quot
white-space: nowrap
&quot
&gt
&lt
span class=&quot
charaLabel&quot
&gt
[[File:GGST_Zato-1_Icon.png|link=GGST/Zato-1|x24px|alt=]]&lt
span style=&quot
visibility:hidden
&quot
&gt
&lt
span style=&quot
white-space: normal
&quot
&gt
[[GGST/Zato-1|Zato-1's]] Eddie) can still cause the servant to hit if the opponent's hurtbox overlaps the servant's hurtbox.
If only a held servant is active, pauses Servant Gauge for only 0.5 seconds.
When used, Servant Gauge will be regained for 1 frame before pausing it.
Hit detection is based on the Servant entity, meaning certain moves may not trigger the Defend Command if they cannot hit as a result of [[GGST/Mechanics#Activation_Range|Activation Ranges]].
If Defend Command is canceled 1F after an enemy attacks the Defend hitbox (e.g., picking up the Servant or issuing a new Command), it will prevent the launch while nullifying the opponent's hitbox (See more: [[GGST/Jack-O/Strategy#Hitbox_Nullifying|Hitbox Nullifying]]).
True damage is 30, but if triggered by an attack, it will usually Counter Hit for +10% damage (33).
It is possible to block the parry if a projectile triggers it. This will guard crush for 38F.

input: サーヴァントシュート(236K)
name: サーヴァントシュート
caption: Good for kicking more than just servants
notes:
Will only launch servants if it strikes their collision box, not their hurtbox.&lt
sup&gt
&lt
i&gt
Potential bug&lt
/i&gt
&lt
/sup&gt

name: サーヴァント召喚
caption: Yeah, we don't know where they come from either
notes:
Cannot be input if 3 servants are currently active.
The servant is summoned on Frame 10 and will remain if Jack-O' Roman Cancels or is hit during Cheer Servant On S.
The servant's duration ticks down after Frame 10 even during Summon Servant's animation, giving 236[P] 4 frames less duration, and 236P 15 frames less duration.
In the mirror match, the servant that has been summoned for longer will always win in a clash. This is irrespective of their actual duration, and only depends on when it was first summoned.

name: サーヴァント召喚
caption: Yeah, we don't know where they come from either

input: サーヴァントを持ち上げる(2P (near Servant))
name: サーヴァントを持ち上げる
caption: Aw, how cute!

input: サーヴァントを投げる(6P/6K/6S/6H/6D while holding Servant)
name: サーヴァントを投げる
notes:
Projectile will continue if Purple Roman Canceled on frame 13 at the earliest.
Clash Level: 2
Clash Hits: 2
Horizontal Activation Range: 200
Thrown servants that hit the wall or edge of the screen will fall down, but remain active until landing.
Performing the air version will still receive Empty Jump landing recovery, unless Jack-O' performs another action.

name: サーヴァント
notes:
Clash Level: 1※
Clash Hits: 1
※Will clash with a single hit of a level 1 or 2 projectile, but can be treated as effectively clash level 1 for most scenarios.

input: サーヴァントを放す(D while holding Servant)
name: サーヴァントを放す
notes: Performing the air version will still receive Empty Jump landing recovery, unless Jack-O' performs another action.

input: 空中サーヴァントシュート(j236K)
name: 空中サーヴァントシュート
notes:
Will only launch servants if it strikes their collision box, not their hurtbox.&lt
sup&gt
&lt
i&gt
Potential bug&lt
/i&gt
&lt
/sup&gt

input: 防御指示(K while holding Servant)
name: 防御指示
notes:
All hitstop from the held servant's attack applies to Jack-O', reducing frame advantage.
Can be Red Roman Canceled when attack connects.

name: サーヴァント
notes:
Clash Level: 2
Clash Hits: 2
Horizontal Activation Range: 200
If a servant is launched by collision from a launched servant, its damage will increase to 50, shown in []. No other properties change.

input: ディフェンスコマンド(S while holding Servant)
name: ディフェンスコマンド
caption: You probably won't use this one much.

input: HSサーヴァントを激励する(236236HS)
name: HSサーヴァントを激励する
caption: Let the onslaught begin!
notes:
Buff activates during super freeze on frame 3 and can be Purple Roman Cancelled immediately after end of super freeze.
Both versions can be active at the same time, providing the benefits of both simultaneously. Their durations will wear-off independently.
Prevents Servant Gauge recharge being paused when using a servant command.
Will not remove a Servant Gauge pause from a servant command issued prior to using Cheer Servant On H.

input: Sサーヴァントを激励すす(236236S)
name: Sサーヴァントを激励すす
caption: Neutral is for people without meter
notes:
Buff activates during super freeze on frame 3 and can be Purple Roman Cancelled immediately after end of super freeze.
Both versions can be active at the same time, providing the benefits of both simultaneously. Their durations will wear-off independently.
Opponents receive only 5F hitstop when hitting servants, similar to Jack-O' hitting her own servants.

input: フォーエヴァーエリシオンドライバー(632146P)
name: フォーエヴァーエリシオンドライバー
caption: This either did all of their health, or none of it.Grab some popcorn, we'll be here a while.
notes:
Hitstop on block: 0F
When blocked, Jack-O' is pushed further airborne during recovery.
* This maintains airborne state on Roman Cancel.
* No change to overall frame-data.
Hitgrab, does not gain additional damage when hit 'counter'.
Cannot be Roman Cancelled during the hit animation.
